Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1965...
Injured on 8/9/1967 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Earned first career win on 4/19/1968...
Had first career hit on 4/24/1968, off John Heron (CI)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1970, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Hit first career homerun on 6/26/1971, off David Trinkle (CC)...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1972, going 27-10, 2.67 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1974, going 5-0, 1.38...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1975, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1975, going 5-1, 0.69...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1975, going 22-8, 2.25 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1976, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1977, going 5-0, 1.55...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1977, going 5-1, 1.78...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1978, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/24/1980 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 7/5/1981 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Syracuse on 2/11/1983...
